sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import Nav from './Nav' import designData from '../data/design_projects' const DesignProjects = () => { const fashionData = [ { imagePath: "/images/timeline.png", imageAlt: "timeline", downloadLink: "/images/timeline.png", title: "40s Fashion Timeline", subtitle: "Fashion work, 2018", text: "A poster detailing the basic timeline of fashion during the 1940s." }, { imagePath: "/images/daydream-nation.png", imageAlt: "type poster", downloadLink: "/images/pdf/daydream-nation.pdf", title: "Fashion brand Booklet", subtitle: "Fashion work, 2018", text: "A booklet I created during my fashion studies of a brand of my own creation, named, 'Daydream Nation'." }, ] console.log(fashionData) const displayGraphic = (data) => { const { imagePath, imageAlt, downloadLink, title, subtitle, text } = data return (

{title && title.toUpperCase()}

{text}

{subtitle}

) } return (
DESIGN PROJECTS

EQUINOX

Brand design for an airline of my creation, 'Equinox' and its mobile booking system.

View prototype

FORMAL BRIEF

A formal brief document detailing the expected timeline, an overview of the proposal, the target audience and the proposed budget.

POSTER

A poster describing the main control flow of the application and screen examples

RESEARCH INTO COMPETITORS

A poster detailing my analysis and findings into Qantas and their app.

GRAPHIC DESIGN

{ designData.map((x) => { return displayGraphic(x) }) }

FASHION

{ fashionData.map(x => { return displayGraphic(x) }) }
) } export default DesignProjects
